abort.zone_initialisation: Failed to initialise one or more zones. Check Log.

error.fetch_zone: Error fetching zone info, is the zone connected?

user.description:
Enter the IP address of each zone of your VSSL device which you would like to control. 

At least one zone is required, all zones entered here should belong to the same VSSL device. 

You can add multiple VSSL devices by adding multiple entries of the integration.
user.title: Set up a new VSSL
